g = gu.AdjacencySetGraph(8, directed=False)
g.add_edge(0, 1)
g.add_edge(1, 2)
g.add_edge(1, 3)
g.add_edge(2, 3)
g.add_edge(1, 4)
g.add_edge(3, 5)
g.add_edge(5, 4)
g.add_edge(3, 6)
g.add_edge(6, 7)
g.add_edge(0, 7)

build_distance_table(g, 0)


_distance_table_to_df(build_distance_table(g, 0))

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
_distance_table_to_df(build_distance_table(g, 0))
expected_dict = {'distance_from_source': {0: 0, 1: 1, 2: 2, 3: 2, 4: 2, 5: 3, 6: 2, 7: 1},
                     'preceding_vertex': {0: 0, 1: 0, 2: 1, 3: 1, 4: 1, 5: 3, 6: 7, 7: 0}
                }

expected = pd.DataFrame(expected_dict)
got = _distance_table_to_df(build_distance_table(g, 0))
comparison_matrix = (got == expected)
not_equal = ~comparison_matrix.all(axis=1)

if not_equal.any():
    raise ValueError(f"{not_equal.sum()} vertices in distance table do not match")
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert shortest_path(g, 0, 5, build_distance_table) == [0,1,3,5]
assert shortest_path(g, 0, 6, build_distance_table) == [0,7,6]
assert shortest_path(g, 7, 4, build_distance_table) == [7,0,1,4]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
g = gu.AdjacencySetGraph(8, directed=True)
g.add_edge(0, 1)
g.add_edge(1, 2)
g.add_edge(1, 3)
g.add_edge(2, 3)
g.add_edge(1, 4)
g.add_edge(3, 5)
g.add_edge(5, 4)
g.add_edge(3, 6)
g.add_edge(6, 7)
g.add_edge(0, 7)

assert shortest_path(g, 0, 5, build_distance_table) == [0,1,3,5]
assert shortest_path(g, 0, 6, build_distance_table) == [0,1,3,6]
assert shortest_path(g, 7, 4, build_distance_table) is None

There is no path from 7 to 4
{% endraw %}
